name: Util.Analytics.SetupGTM
description:
Analytics Setup Script

This script will insert a script tag to pull down the google tag manager library. That library will also handle pulling down the google analytics library.

Invoke this function with the unique GTM container ID from you friendly neighborhood analytics contact.

NOTE: will attach dataLayer to window for namespacing analytics events.

params.name: containerId
params.description: Unique id matching application GTM id
